definitions.text: a reserve of money set aside for some purpose
a supply of something available for future use
examples: he brought back a large store of Cuban cigars

definitions.text: a financial institution that sells shares to individuals and invests in securities issued by other companies
convert (short-term floating debt) into long-term debt that bears fixed interest and is represented by bonds
place or store up in a fund for accumulation
provide a fund for the redemption of principal or payment of interest
accumulate a fund for the discharge of a recurrent liability

examples: The government funds basic research in many areas
